Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: A3 and A4 photocopier, CDs, DVDs, jigsaws, language tapes, newspapers and spoken word cassettes. Activities include children's activities, Councillors' surgeries and Adult Reading Group. Provides 9 People's Network computers (4 dedicated to children) with Microsoft Office and Internet access available for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-12.30pm, 1.30-7.30pm, Tues & Sat 9.30am-12.30pm, Wed & Fri 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-5.30pm, Thurs closed (opening times); Baby Time, Story Time, Chatterboox (children's reading group, see separate entry), teenage reading group (see separate entry), adult reading group (see separate entry), please ring for details
